For those who are like me who doesn't wanna waste bandwidth and time downloading another full game torrent just do as Pshok said.

1. In game folder, open 'skidrow.ini' file with notepad.
2. Change:  Language = "english"
3. Save and close notepad.
4. Go to Kickass Torrent and search for "hitman absolution english files".
5. Download the files and when its done, unzip it in the main game folder.

Now when you open the game, you will have all menu, sound and su

...and subtitle in english.

- Intel Core2Duo 2.13GHz
- 4GB DDR2 RAM
- EVGA GTX460 768MB / Leadtek GTX650 1GB
